How to pronounce 'git'

December 3rd, 2015

I meet many people who pronounce “git”? jit : get … So i searched it,below is the result from stackExchange,for more detail ,refer source in the end.

  • Q: -How do you pronounce Git? Because I don’t live in a country that uses English, I haven’t heard it yet. In my country, some people use [ɡɪt] and others use [jɪt]. Which is the one that most people use?-asked Nov 8 ‘11 at 2:22 Benjamin –The pronunciation is [ɡít] – yoozer8 Nov 8 ‘11 at 2:26

  • A: -If you need to know for sure, go to the source! Video presentation about git by Linus Torvalds This confirms that [ɡít] is the expected pronunciation.-answered Nov 8 ‘11 at 11:51 Matt E. Эллен♦ –What in the world is an acute accent in IPA? There’s no such diacritic. Surely you just mean [gɪt] for the pronunciation! – tchrist May 13 ‘12 at 0:37

给特，not 吉特

sourcePage

  • 随笔 (7)
